title: Fully Remodeled 2bd/1ba w/ SS Appl + W/D (231-4)
posting_body: ['231 Lucas Ave. #4', 'Los Angeles, CA 90026', 'Available NOW!', '****', 'MOVE-IN SPECIAL', 'Start your lease today and get 4 weeks free upon signing a one-year lease!', 'The actual rent is $2,695.00 but receiving 4 weeks free will bring your net-effective rent to ONLY $2,470.42 over the course of 12 months.', 'The monthly rent will be $2,695.00.', "Welcome to 225-233 Lucas Ave, new high end apartment adjacent to L.A.'s iconic Echo Park neighborhood.", 'Featuring serene two and three bedroom apartments surrounded by beautiful new gardens and picturesque landscapes.', 'Inside the newly remodeled residences, revel in bright and airy living room/kitchen space with beautiful open floor plans and woods flooring throughout.', 'Be the first to enjoy all new stainless steel appliances in newly remodeled kitchens with jet black quartz and matte black finishes.', 'All units are fully equipped with a washer and dryer, all new appliances, and mini-split air conditioner.', 'Enjoy the best of city living by stepping outside your private oasis into one of our new layouts that offer a private patio or balcony.', 'Disclaimer - pictures may not be of the exact vacant unit but represents the style and fixtures of the exact unit.', 'AMENITIES:', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Hardwood Flooring', '- Minisplit AC System', '- Washer and dryer in unit.', '- Mirror Closets', '- Recessed Lighting', '- Patio/Balcony in select units', 'UTILITIES INCLUDED:', '- hot water, cold water, and gas.', 'DETAILS:', '- 2 bedrooms / 1 bathroom', 'PARKING:', '- No parking.', 'PET POLICY:', '- will consider pets.', 'RENTAL TERMS:', '- Application Fee: $36 (Non- Refundable)', '- Lease: 1-year minimum.', '- Security Deposit: $1,500 on approved credit only.', 'Please call our office to schedule a showing!']
